Metadata.title: Othoutils | Speech-language pathology clinical references
Metadata.description: Catalog of clinical tools validated by speech-language pathologists with editorial governance and validation tracking.

Header.tagline: Clinically vetted resources by speech-language pathologists

Hero.sectionLabel: References designed and validated by speech-language pathologists
Hero.title: A clinical library to consult proven tools and track their validation
Hero.lead: Built for clinics, hospitals, and rehab centers: Othoutils highlights questionnaires, batteries, and follow-up sheets already reviewed by healthcare professionals. Teams can then quietly propose documented adjustments that are reviewed before publication.

cards.verifiedDesc: Each sheet is reviewed by speech-language pathologists and published with the details practitioners need.
cards.peerDesc: A clear review flow: draft, interdisciplinary review, then secure publishing.
cards.readyDesc: Bright, readable, and accessible interface for the clinic, hospital, or on the go.

Referentials.errorSubtitle: Check your connection or reload the page. The request goes through Supabase with RLS enabled.
Referentials.emptyState: No reference is available yet. Check that the data is present in Supabase.

Tools.headingText: A quick view of the tests in the database, coming straight from Supabase via Drizzle to stay aligned with the schema.

errors.load: Tests cannot be retrieved right now. Check the Supabase connection or try again later.

Tools.emptyState: No test is available yet. Add entries in Supabase to feed the catalog.

items.workflow: Keep drafts, validated sheets, and community content in clearly separated spaces.
items.committee: Set up a multidisciplinary review board with automatic validation assignments.
items.archives: Archive versions to track changes, comments, and therapeutic decisions.

fallback.description: This tool does not yet have a detailed description.

errors.fetch: The tools could not be retrieved right now. Please try again later.

metadata.title: Othoutils | Clinical catalog
metadata.description: Tests, tools, and speech-language evaluations gathered in a curated catalog.

Catalogue.headingText: Find published evaluations, their clinical objectives, target populations, and practical details to plan your sessions.

errors.load: The catalog cannot be displayed right now. Check the Supabase connection or try again shortly.

Catalogue.emptyState: No test is cataloged yet. Add your first tests to populate the catalog.

metadata.title: Manage tests | Othoutils
metadata.description: Add or update a test along with its domains and tags.

TestsManage.pageLead: Use this form to create a test or edit an existing sheet, including its associated tags and domains.

shortDescription.placeholder: Present the tool and what makes it unique.

objective.placeholder: What does this test measure? When should it be used?

notes.placeholder: Internal observations or links to related resources.

bibliography.title: Bibliography
bibliography.helper: Add links to articles, videos, or useful references.
bibliography.empty: No links yet. Add your first reference below.
bibliography.addHelper: Provide a short title and a valid URL. Links are saved with the test.

additionalInfo.title: Additional information
additionalInfo.materialsPlaceholder: List the exact materials, grids, or supports required.

properties.title: Properties
properties.helper: Consider the key properties as in a Notion sheet.

edition.title: Publishing & access
edition.standardizationHelper: Toggle according to the nature of the protocol.

taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
taxonomy.domainsHelper: Refine the sheet by adding one or more domains.
taxonomy.tagsHelper: Add keywords to make search easier.

multiSelect.dialogHelper: Type to filter, click to add or remove.

states.loadTaxonomyError: Unable to load domains and tags.
states.success: The test and its relations have been saved.

validation.bibliographyLabel: A title is required for this reference.

Footer.note: Made with care for speech-language pathology teams. Mobile-first, adaptive, and built for collaboration.

metadata.title: Manage tests | Othoutils
metadata.description: Add or update a test with its domains and tags.

page.title: Add / Edit a test
page.lead: Use this form to create a test or edit an existing sheet, including its associated tags and domains.

shortDescription.label: Long description
shortDescription.placeholder: Introduce the tool and what makes it unique.

objective.label: Objective
objective.placeholder: What does this test measure? In which context should it be used?

notes.label: Internal notes
notes.placeholder: Internal observations or links to related resources.

populationDetailed.label: Target audience
populationDetailed.placeholder: Add more detail about the audience if needed

materialsDetailed.label: Detailed materials
materialsDetailed.placeholder: List the precise materials, grids, or supporting documents required.

standardization.label: Standardization
standardization.helper: Toggle according to the protocol type.

domains.label: Domains
domains.description: Refine the sheet by adding one or more domains.

bibliography.title: Bibliography
bibliography.helper: Add links to useful articles, videos, or references.
bibliography.empty: No link yet. Add your first reference below.

properties.title: Properties
properties.helper: Think about key properties as in a Notion sheet.

bibliography.addHelper: Provide a short title and a valid URL. Links will be stored with the test.

multiSelect.filterHelper: Type to filter, click to add or remove.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.fetchTaxonomy: Unable to load domains and tags.

success.saved: The test and its relations have been saved.

metadata.title: Manage categories and tags | Othoutils
metadata.description: Add, delete, or rename test domains and tags.

page.title: Categories & tags
page.lead: Centralize the list of domains and tags used in the test sheet. Items created here are immediately available in the "Add / Edit a test" form.

domains.title: Create a domain
domains.helper: Domains feed the "Domains" list in the Add / Edit a test form.

tags.title: Create a tag
tags.helper: Tags enrich search and filters in test sheets.

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.timeout: The request timed out, please try again.
errors.fetch: Unable to retrieve domains and tags.

toasts.domainCreated: The domain has been saved and will be available in the test form.
toasts.tagCreated: The tag has been saved and will be available in the test form.

metadata.title: Add a tool | Othoutils
metadata.description: Create a tool sheet to enrich the catalog.

intro.title: Fill in the key details so a new sheet appears in the catalog.
intro.required: The Name, Category, Type, Tags, and Source fields are required. Sheets created here are flagged as community contributions and will appear in the main list.
intro.preview: Need to review the layout? Check the <catalogLink>catalog</catalogLink> after publishing.

helpers.tags: Separate tags with commas. They will be used to filter the catalog.

tags.required: Add at least one tag, separated by commas

source.url: Source must be a valid URL

feedback.success: The sheet has been created. It will appear in the catalog under the “Community” label.
